titleStmt.title: An act for setling the militia for the City of London, and liberties thereof. Thursday, July 7. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas Clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field and Henry Hills, printers to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleet-street, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Parliamentary Proceedings July 1659"; "July. 11".
Cover ornament; Initial letter; some text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleet-street, over against Dunstans Church
